title: The Nativity, with God the Father Surrounded by Angels and Cherubim
dimensions:
joined NGA and MMA panels: 83.5 x 57.5 cm (32 7/8 x 22 5/8 in.)
framed: 97.8 x 73.7 x 4.8 cm (38 1/2 x 29 x 1 7/8 in.)
only NGA lunette (oval): 36.6 x 51.7 cm (14 7/16 x 20 3/8 in.)
creditline: The Metropolitan Museum of Art, New York.  Gift of George Blumenthal, 1941.100.2; National Gallery of Art, Washington, D.C. Samuel H. Kress Collection, 1952.5.8
